journal.translation[0].definitions[0].de: a serious magazine produced for professional people or those with a particular interest
journal.translation[0].definitions[1].de: a written record that you make of the things that happen to you each day
journal.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: He decided to keep a journal.
journal.translation[1].definitions[0].de: a serious magazine or newspaper produced for professional people or those with a particular interest
